name: Claustrophobe (Andrew)
description:
You are a test subject who is thrown inside a bright room.

You are  to keep you sanity while you are in there and keep counting time as you go,

if you leave the room after a day passes you will not be designated for termination.

*i made this in a few days only, if you want me to make the game bigger please consider leaving feedback and your opinions. Thanks.

Controls :

W, A, S, D to move

E to interact

Playtime : depends on how long it takes  to be figured out.
